title: Question:
author: Metaedu Official
created_time: August 22, 2022, 06:20:35 AMLast edit: August 25, 2022, 04:20:07 AM by Metaedu Official
content: METAEDU UNIVERSE is a Metaverse virtual universe researched and developed for Education by Metafora Teknologi Nusantara (MeTaNus) Studio. METAEDU is inspired by “Stephen Spielberg” science fiction movie “Ready Player One” which combining physical world of education with an unlimited super universe of realm where the realm are linked together through the METAEDU PORTAL. Parallelly, the METAEDU PORTAL is integrated with METAEDU WALLET which is developed on the blockchain network to enhanced the experienced of digital crypto currency for the player to store tokens and NFT assets by using this wallet. Over the past decade, we have seen technological developments that enable  the blending of the physical and the virtual. Augmenting reality with layers of information from the virtual world is now enabled in various ways for a myriad of applications – from personal entertainment to enterprise projects.  Essentially METAEDU Is the Integration of 4 different entities I.e Infrastructure, Cyberspace, Community and Finance which components are Edge and cloud computing in 5G technology, XR technology, education community and the Blockchain with Cryptocurrency respectively.MEU Token - BEP20 BSC platformName : METAEDUTicker : MEUPlatform : BSC (Binance Smart Chain)Type : BEP-20Decimal : 18Total Supply : 40.000.000.000 MEUSmart Contract : 0x35304d57ee5e06733ba9b894a0acbbb0ba4c7c3eTotal Hardcap : 21.100.000 USD
